ndfs

Class NDFSFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ndfs.NDFSFactory

  • public class NDFSFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory class is responsible for creating NDFS objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NDFS createMCNDFS(java.io.File promelaFile, int nrWorkers, java.lang.String version)
      This method creates an NDFS object using Java introspection.
      static NDFS createNNDFS(java.io.File promelaFile)
      This method creates a sequential NDFS object using the specified Promela file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • createNNDFS

        public static NDFS createNNDFS(java.io.File promelaFile)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method creates a sequential NDFS object using the specified Promela file.
        Parameters:
        promelaFile - the Promela file specifying the graph.
        Returns:
        the NDFS object which implements sequential NDFS.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown in case the specified Promela file could not be read.

      • createMCNDFS

        public static NDFS createMCNDFS(java.io.File promelaFile,
                                int nrWorkers,
                                java.lang.String version)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates an NDFS object using Java introspection. The assumption here is that the class name of the NDFS object can be constructed as "ndfs.mcndfs_", followed by the specified version, followed by ".NNDFS", for instance, if the version parameter is "1_naive", we would get the class name "ndfs.mcndfs_1_naive.NNDFS". Also assumed is that this class has a public constructor with two parameters: a File and an integer, specifying the Promela file and the number of workers, respectively.

        Exception handling is extremely basic here (read: absent; everything is passed through).

        Parameters:
        promelaFile - the Promela file specifying the graph.
        nrWorkers - the number of worker threads to be used.
        version - the specified version.
        Returns:
        the NDFS object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown in case something goes wrong.
